GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.18.10
GSD.description:
net: ipv6: unexport __init-annotated seg6_hmac_net_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit 05893c61bbd4aecca8452dcb9ce9f9fc337bdc9c, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit bf355b8d2c30a289232042cacc1cfaea4923936c. For more details please see the references link.
